title: chemical_free_kale_growth_observation
summary: Kale grown naturally for approximately 2 months with water-only care, no fertilizer, and no chemical inputs; ready for household consumption.
description: This record documents a kale plant cultivated at MaMeeFarm under minimal-input conditions. The plant was maintained with water-only care and without the use of fertilizers or chemical treatments. At approximately 2 months of growth, the kale is suitable for harvesting and consumption as part of household food supply.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
